```{r out.width='100%', fig.height=6, eval=require('leaflet')}
library(leaflet)
leaflet() %>% 
addProviderTiles(providers$Esri.WorldStreetMap) %>% 
setView(-74.051257, 4.673637 ,zoom = 17)  %>% addMarkers(lat=4.673637, lng=-74.051257)
```
